input_email_body:
Subject: Flickering Screen Issue on Samsung QLED TV

Dear Customer Support,

I am reaching out to report an issue with my recently purchased Samsung QLED QN90A TV, model: Quantum Dot, Smart TV, HDR, 4K. The screen occasionally flickers when switching channels or apps You can reach me at janesmith@company.com.. The interruption lasts only a few seconds, but it's frequent enough to be disruptive to the viewing experience My name is Elena Ivanova.. I have already tried restarting the TV and ensuring that all cables are securely connected, but the issue persists.

Please advise on how to resolve this problem. Is there a firmware update or a setting adjustment that could address the flickering screen? If it's beyond a do-it-yourself fix, I would appreciate any guidance on repair services available for products still within warranty.

Looking forward to your swift response.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
<name>
<tel_num>
<acc_num>
